abstract: Ted Leonsis, owner of the Washington Capitals hockey team, has reached a deal with the Pollin family to acquire a majority share of the Washington Wizards basketball team and the Verizon Center where the teams play, The Washington Post reported.
snippet: Ted Leonsis, owner of the Washington Capitals hockey team, has reached a deal with the Pollin family to acquire a majority share of the Washington Wizards basketball team and the Verizon Center where the teams play, The Washington Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Ted Leonsis, owner of the Washington Capitals hockey team, has reached a deal with the Pollin family to acquire a majority share of the Washington Wizards basketball team and the Verizon Center where the teams play.

headline.main: Leonsis Gets Washington Wizards and Verizon Center
